title: #255 - Chris Titus & ME
description:
Comedian Chris Titus & I hangout in the Mancave to talk about Joe Rogan, theater tours, 4 walling venues, writing, his new movie Special Unit, and he issues a challenge to me to write The Machine script by DECEMBER 15th.

To get my book "Life of the Party" click HERE: https://www.amazon.com/Life-Party-Stories-Perpetual-Man-Child/dp/1250030250

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com

To Follow me on..

Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer

This episode is brought to you by BEACHBODY ON DEMAND to claim a free trail membership TEXT [Bert] to 303030 and get full access to this entire platform for free!

This episode is also brought to you by ZipRecruiter and right now, my listeners can post jobs on ZipRecruiter for free by going to https://www.ziprecruiter.com/bertcast

This episode is also brought to you by Blue Apron to get Three Free MEALS w/ Free Shipping go to https://www.blueapron.com/bertcast
